name: The Grind (ephun, SirStotes, BoxEnjoyer)
description:
The Grind Tell me, what lurks in the dark?

The Grind is a satirical horror roguelite made from scratch in a week for 7DRL 2023. You take on the role of a nameless wage laborer who finds themself working for a vague and menacing megacorporation. Discover the secrets of the Oro Bros. Meat and Poultry Packaging warehouse—that is, if you can avoid starvation for long enough.

Featuring
  • Procedurally generated levels
  • Punishing perma-death mechanics
  • A slew of different enemy types
  • PowerWash Simulator-esque Gameplay
Credits

Lead Programming: Dallin Hoyt

Additional Programming/Art: Isaiah Stotesbery

Story/Sound: Ethan Kendrick

Music/Additional Sound: Marshall Pease

q̸̍̽̏͋̽̀͐̉͘͜͝a̴̙͒̒͋̄͂̀͋̅͘ȇ̵͍̱͉̝̑͑̅̕͝m̶̱͉͕̞̟̺͚̣͕̠͐͑̈́͗̀͠͠ĕ̶̼̹̾͗̄ ̴̙͊͊ḃ̸̡̨̛͙̣͖͕̗̘̱̌ͅp̵̡̖̖͕̠͍̣̦͈̟̑͂͌̅̓͊̈̆͠ ̸̢̑͐̅̓̓̅̐͠a̸̡̛͚̬̮͕̒͗̄̍j̵̧̝̘̳̆̽̊̀͝k̶̳̺͂́̒͑̓̄͠͠ḙ̷̬̞̣̱͖͔̓͒͒͜͝
